notes: Stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal.
Cannot lifesteal off of wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Heals the attacker for 7% of attack damage dealt
params: Lifesteal particles are visible on illusions, but they do not gain health from their attacks.

additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 140 health, 0.7 health regen, and 7 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 1.17 armor, 7 attack speed, and 7 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 84 mana, 0.35 mana regen, and 7 attack damage.
name: Possessed Mask
description: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.
